title: No-Bake Crispy Corn Flake Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars Recipe

Directions
Line an 8- by 8-inch baking pan with foil (see notes). In a medium saucepan over medium heat, melt butter. Add peanut butter, corn syrup, brown sugar, and salt and continue to cook, stirring, until melted and smooth.
Stir in corn flakes, 1/4 cup peanuts, and vanilla until just combined. Spoon into prepared pan and smooth top.
In a heatproof bowl over a pan of barely simmering water (or in a microwave), heat chocolate until just melted. Spread over top. Sprinkle with remaining chopped peanuts. Chill until firm, about 2 hours (see notes). Remove from pan and cut into 2-inch squares.
Special Equipment
8- by 8-inch pan (see notes)
Notes
A 9- by 9-inch pan can also be used.
Bars will soften at room temperature. For best results, keep chilled until ready to serve.
